languages.text: "Потому что ими движет горе утраты. Порой боль и скорбь ослепляют даже лучших из нас".

traits.locale_text: "Потому что ими движет горе утраты. Порой боль и скорбь ослепляют даже лучших из нас".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Because they are driven by grief. Sometimes pain and loss blinds even the best of us."
languages.original_text: "Потому что ими движет горе утраты. Порой боль и скорбь ослепляют даже лучших из нас".

traits.locale_text: "Because they are driven by grief and bereavement. Sometimes the pain blinds even the best of us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Because they are driven by grief and bereavement. Sometimes the pain blinds even the best of us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Because they are driven by grief and bereavement. Sometimes the pain blinds even the best of us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Because they are driven by grief and bereavement. Sometimes the pain blinds even the best of us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Because they are driven by grief. Sometimes pain and loss blinds even the best of us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Because they are driven by grief. Sometimes pain and loss blinds even the best of us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Porque los mueve el desconsuelo. A veces el dolor y la pérdida ciegan incluso a los mejores de nosotros».
languages.original_text: "Because they are driven by grief. Sometimes pain and loss blinds even the best of us."

traits.locale_text: «Porque los mueven el desconsuelo y el luto. A veces el dolor ciega incluso a los mejores de nosotros».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “因为他们心中充满了丧亲之痛。有的时候，即便是最优秀的人，也会被痛苦蒙蔽双眼。”
languages.original_text: "Because they are driven by grief. Sometimes pain and loss blinds even the best of us."

traits.locale_text: “因为他们心中充满了悲伤与丧亲之痛。有的时候，即便是最优秀的人，也会被痛苦蒙蔽。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Parce qu'ils sont fous de chagrin. Même les meilleurs d'entre nous sont parfois rendus aveugles par le deuil et la douleur. »
languages.original_text: "Because they are driven by grief. Sometimes pain and loss blinds even the best of us."

traits.locale_text: « Parce qu'ils sont fous de douleur et de chagrin. Même les meilleurs d'entre nous sont parfois rendus aveugles par le deuil. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「彼らが悲嘆に駆られているからだ。時に痛みは、どんなに優秀な人間でさえも盲目にさせる」
languages.original_text: "Because they are driven by grief. Sometimes pain and loss blinds even the best of us."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らが悲嘆に駆られているからだ。時に痛みは、どんなに優秀な人間でさえも盲目にさせる」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Weil sie von Trauer angetrieben werden. Manchmal blendet der Schmerz und Verlust selbst die Besten unter uns."
languages.original_text: "Because they are driven by grief. Sometimes pain and loss blinds even the best of us."

traits.locale_text: "Weil sie von Trauer und Verlust angetrieben werden. Manchmal blendet der Schmerz selbst die Besten unter uns."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Çünkü güçlerini kederden alıyorlar. Bazen acı ve kayıp, en iyilerimizi bile kör edebilir."
languages.original_text: "Because they are driven by grief. Sometimes pain and loss blinds even the best of us."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü güçlerini kederden alıyorlar. Bazen acı ve kayıp, en iyilerimizi bile kör edebilir."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
